title: Winning a 3v5 in low gold/high silver? No problem.

replies.body: Looks like you had a full team that was stomping them till about 20 minutes in.  I'd wager by the  time you had afks, mf and annie were probably just standing around spamming surrender votes.  Still a good job on closing it out, but from the looks of things they had probably given up before they even realized it was 3 vs 5

It seems like it. Thankfully my team knew how to close the game off, and a couple of nifty plays won us that game. Could have gone terrible wrong, but then again, we were betting on the enemy team being bad too. So, we need to consider all factors.

You forgot to redact the chat post proving that it was 3v4. YOU HAD ONE JOB TO DO, MARI- wait... your name...

OH

MAH

GAWSH!

LOL 

OH MYYYY

IS THIS EVEN REAL

And by the way, the Annie was not *REALLY* AFK. She just gave up and was trolling in base the last couple of minutes. Our Riven and Rammus, on the other hand, had been AFK for like half the game.
